title: Sexual harassment in schools
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, Sabina Baltrukomis and Victoria. Ministry of Education
brief_description: This program looks at some examples of sexual harassment in a school setting. Focuses on the consequences of harassing behaviour and avenues available to people who wish to take action to prevent it continuing. Ways of dealing with such incidences are suggested and legal rights under the Equal Opportunity Act 1984 are explained.
